hibernate-mapping.query: from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.ServerGroup as s where s.id = :id and s.org = :org and (s.groupType is null)
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.ServerGroup as s where s.name = :name and s.org = :org and (s.groupType is null)
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.ServerGroup as s where s.groupType = :groupType and s.org = :org
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {sg.*} from rhnServerGroup SG where SG.group_type = (select id from rhnServerGroupType where label = :label) AND SG.org_id = :org_id
hibernate-mapping.query: from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.ServerGroup as s where s.groupType.label = :label and s.org = :org
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {wc.*} from WEB_CONTACT wc inner join rhnUserManagedServerGroups umsg on wc.id = umsg.user_id inner join rhnServerGroup SG on SG.id = umsg.server_group_id where sg.id = :sgid and sg.org_id = :org_id

select {sg.*} from rhnServerGroup SG where sg.group_type is null AND sg.org_id = :org_id AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from rhnUserServerGroupPerms usgp where usgp.server_group_id = sg.id AND NOT Exists ( select 1 from rhnUserGroupMembers ugm inner join rhnUserGroup ug on ug.id = ugm.user_group_id inner join rhnUserGroupType ugt on ug.group_type = ugt.id where ugt.label != 'org_admin' AND ug.org_id=sg.org_id AND ugm.user_id = usgp.user_id ))
select s.id from rhnServer s inner join rhnServerGroupMembers sgm on s.id = sgm.server_id where sgm.server_group_id = :sgid and s.org_id = :org_id
select Current_Members from rhnServerGroup where id = :sgid
hibernate-mapping.query: select sg from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.Server as s inner join s.groups as sg where s.id = :id and (sg.groupType is not null)
select sg from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.Server as s inner join s.groups as sg where s.id = :id and (sg.groupType is null)
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.EntitlementServerGroup as s where s.org = :org and (s.groupType is not null)
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.ManagedServerGroup as s where s.org = :org and (s.groupType is null)
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT S.id FROM rhnServerGroupMembers SGM inner join rhnServer S on SGM.server_id = s.id inner join rhnServerInfo SI on S.id = SI.server_id WHERE SI.checkin >= (sysdate - :threshold) AND SGM.server_group_id = :sgid

SELECT S.id FROM rhnServerGroupMembers SGM inner join rhnServer S on SGM.server_id = s.id inner join rhnServerInfo SI on S.id = SI.server_id WHERE SI.checkin < (sysdate - :threshold) AND SGM.server_group_id = :sgid
